name: XCTestRun
desc: A base class for collecting information about a specific execution of a test.

items.name: init(test: XCTest)
items.desc: Creates a new test run for the provided test.

items.name: func record(XCTIssue)
items.desc: Records an issue during test execution for the test run.

items.name: var startDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time when the test run started, or no value if the test hasn’t run.

items.name: var stopDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time when the test run stopped, or no value if the test hasn’t run.

items.name: var testDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The number of seconds that elapse between when the run starts and when it stops.

items.name: var totalDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The number of seconds that elapse between when the run starts and when it stops.

items.name: var hasSucceeded: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that returns true if all tests in the run completed without recording any failures; otherwise, false.

items.name: var hasBeenSkipped: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates a skipped test.

items.name: var executionCount: Int
items.desc: The number of test executions during the run.

items.name: var failureCount: Int
items.desc: The number of test failures during the run.

items.name: var skipCount: Int
items.desc: The number of skipped tests during the run.

items.name: var test: XCTest
items.desc: The test instance for the test run.

items.name: var testCaseCount: Int
items.desc: The number of tests in the run.

items.name: var totalFailureCount: Int
items.desc: The number of test failures and uncaught exceptions during the run.

items.name: var unexpectedExceptionCount: Int
items.desc: The number of uncaught exceptions during the run.
